content:
/>
V.ii.2.C.2.f
.
Considering the Usual Effects of Medical or Surgical Treatment
As required under
38 CFR 3.306(b)(1)
, unless a disease or injury that was incurred prior to service is otherwise aggravated by service, do not establish SC for the usual effects of medical or surgical treatment in service to correct or improve the condition, such as post-operative scars and/or absent or poorly functioning parts or organs.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section C - In-Service Aggravation of a Pre-Service Disability
citation: Part V, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section C
